block.p: The Earth Mother She recycles -- for the entire school -- and gives hand-me-downs as birthday gifts. She's going to save the earth, even if she has to ruin everybody else's day doing it. White & Warren sweater-tee made of eco-friendly bamboo in white, black and terra ($90 at whiteandwarren.com).

The Stepford-in-Law Three husbands in, she's still smiling, although she's clamped down so tightly, you'd swear she was making a diamond in her jawbone. She can barely pick her grandchildren out of a police lineup, but she's always ready to pour you another Scotch. Lacoste new stretch polo with two-inch-longer hemline and five-button placket for easier fit ($75 at Lacoste boutiques).

The GlamoraMa She's gorgeous, stainless, childless-looking. Come to think of it, shouldn't someone unleash your inner GlamoraMa? The Grace dress by the new Ella Moss Black Label collection ($380 at shopbop.com).

The Sanctimommy She does Mommy and Me yoga. She keeps track of playdates in a neat agenda. She refers to her offspring as ''munchkins.'' And you don't! Casall workout clothing ($66 to $205 at powerpilates.com). MomAgenda day planner with scheduling columns for Mom and up to four kids ($42 in pink, green, blue or chocolate at the Scholastic Store in New York, 212-343-6166).

The Newly Bred The new (or nearly) mom is the most expectant mother on the list, so note to dads: Don't botch this first Mother's Day. (P.S. Skip the romantic hotel room: She's not in the mood.) Cartier's new diamond love bracelet with a brown toile de moire strap, in stores in June, available for preorder at (800) 227-8437 ($2,550); without diamonds on a leather strap ($1,300, both at Cartier boutiques); Louis Vuitton diaper bag in pink, blue or brown monogram ($1,870 at Louis Vuitton boutiques).

The Real-Life Mom She can go from American Girl to American Idol to American Pastoral in 60 seconds. When she kisses the kids good night, she'll lie down for a little nap -- only to wake with a start at 1 a.m. and pack the lunches. From dawn to dusk, she's the star of the show. Prada gold aviator sunglasses with brown gradient lenses and tortoise arms ($265 at Bergdorf Goodman in New York, 212-753-7300). Mum's the Word pajamas by Scanty in superwashed cotton ($95 for camisole and pants set at sleepyheads.com).

The Other Mother Where would you be without nanny or Granny or the faithful neighbor, ready to step in when long days get longer? Everybody needs an Other Mother -- make sure you lavish thanks on yours. Bliss Simply the Zest Lemon and Sage Spa in a Box ($36 at blissworld.com) and Fresh Hesperides gift set ($38 at fresh.com).
